section.title: Synopsis
Description
section.p: expm1 and expm1f calculate the exponential of x and subtract 1, that is, is the base of the natural system of logarithms, approximately 2.71828). The result is accurate even for small values of x, where using exp(x)-1 would lose many significant digits.

section.title: Returns
section.p: e raised to the power x, minus 1.
